SocialHandBird: Downloaded 4 sceneline releases today, this being one of them, they all work.

As a rule of thumb; Fake uploaders just upload 1 big rar. When the upload is divided into many smaller RAR-files usually it indicates a proper release. And they all have a sample-MKV that you can download and check if in doubt.
